make a second ear ℹ sew both ears next to the hair on the bodys head sprout 01 green 7ch fo leave a tail for sewing 7 ℹ sew both ends through the chains towards the center chain knot both ends together cut the shorter one and leave the longer ℹ one for sewing knot the lose end onto the top center of the bodys head not ℹ pulling it all the way in but use some of the yarns tail as the stem of a tail for sewing 7 ℹ make a second wing sew both wings below the red bobbles beside its belly where the ℹ green color changes to yellow tail 01 red 9ch 9 02 red skip 1 chain 2hdc 2dc 1tc 1dc 1hdc 1sc 1ch turn 9 03 red skip 1 chain 17sc all around fo leave a tail for sewing 17 sew the tail centered to its butt where the green color changes ℹ to yellow 2× feet 01 red 10ch 10 red skip 1 chain 4slst 5ch skip 1ch 9slst fo leave a tail for sewing 02 18 ℹ make a second foot ℹ sew both feet partially not the tips onto roughly bellow its belly farewell and that s it well done you did it i hope you like your little birb consider sharing photos of your tuku ℹ friend on ribblr and/or the mooneye studios community discord server have a great day
